header_text: You are getting ready to go on a first date with someone you haven't previously met in person. You believe you two have a lot in common, but you are worried that sometimes you become very shy when you are nervous.

elements.text: As you think about going on your first date, you do not think that you will make a bad impression. You believe that your date will think you are...
